rows.label: qev092203_MSG0001
rows.name: You're finally here-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0001_2
rows.name:
Caravan was attacked again
while waiting for you to arrive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Pollen Orbs got stolen,
and Lularita got injured! It was awful-mo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about Lularita's injury.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0020
rows.name: Point Out

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0021
rows.name: Point out that she doesn't look injured.

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lularita is the caravan's number one warrior!
An injury like this won't get me down-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0004
rows.name:
A scrape that takes three days to heal[ST:wide ]— I want you
to make them pay dearly for this-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0005
rows.name:
Look closely-meh!
My arm's scraped right here-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0006
rows.name:
Monsters very powerful to inflict such
grave harm on best warrior of caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'll tell you the location, so
hurry up and go to its nest and take care of it-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0008
rows.name:
Yes. We'll do our best so the Nopon
can live in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0009
rows.name:
If I'm with you,
I'm sure we can manage somehow[ST:wide ]— Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you'll handle it.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that if you don't cooperate together, you can't win.

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0010
rows.name:
It's the first time someone's said something like that to me[ST:wide ]—
I'm very happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Being able to rely on someone like this
is really wonderful, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0012
rows.name:
You're right.
I will protect you no matter what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0013
rows.name: Okay[ST:wide ]— Let's depart then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0014
rows.name:
That thing is an outrageous monster that even Lularita, the caravan's #1 warrior,
can't handle-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0015
rows.name:
I don't know if even you guys can win[ST:wide ]—
Prepare properly before you go-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ohh! You're back safely-meh!
How'd it go-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0017
rows.name: Did you avenge Lularita's injury-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0018
rows.name:
es. I believe this caravan will no longer
be attacked by those native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well done-mo!
Asking you was really the right choice-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0020
rows.name:
Wow~ And since it was free,
it's super convenient and great-meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0020_2
rows.name: I'll ask again sometime-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0050
rows.name: Get Angry

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0051
rows.name: Get angry at the rude Lularita.

rows.label: qev092203_JNK0060
rows.name: Agreement

rows.label: qev092203_SEL0061
rows.name: Cheerfully say, "Leave it to us anytime."

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0021
rows.name:
Nn? What are you being grumpy about, meh?
There's nothing more wonderful than getting freebies, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0021_m
rows.name:
Nn? What are you being grrumpy about, meh?
There's nothing more wonderful than getting freebies, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0021_f
rows.name:
Nn? What are you being grumpy about, meh?
There's nothing more wonderful than getting freebies, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0022
rows.name:
Heheh. That's true.
That's a very Nopon way of thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0023
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Um...
Thank you for being considerate of my feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0024
rows.name:
Other than Ornela-san, you're the first person
to treat me with such consideration[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'm often told I'm too nice/a pushover,
but you're quite the same, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0026
rows.name:
There are still lots of troublesome things-meh~!
You're a great help-meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0027
rows.name:
From fixing a leaky roof
to washing piles of laundry[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0028
rows.name:
Journeying this far together with you
was truly wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'd like to try working together
like this again sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0030
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Well then, for now,
let's head back to Ornela-san.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0031
rows.name:
Because I must properly thank you
for being so kind to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0032
rows.name:
Even among Nopon, the girl Himeri who'll listen to anything
was becoming a rumor-meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0033
rows.name:
Lularita will definitely be back to NLA to ask for
more, so look forward to that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092203_MSG0034
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—Ah! For free, of course-meh![ST:wait ]
